transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ah, sollunga sir. 
Executive: India Mart-la irunthu call panniruken sir, business account irukku.
Customer: Ah, aama sir, sir, lead-eh varala sir, athan sir call pannen sir.
Executive: Okay, enakku call panniningala ma?
Customer: Ah, naan ungaloda chat-na ninaichu number eduthen andhu Krishna sir-a.
Executive: Manager-a pesiningala?
Customer: Aama, manager-a pesiningala? Naan pesitten sir, avanga vandhu leads naan varala-nu sollirundhen, athukku sonnanga konjam, naan athukku apparam Dinesh sir-ta pesitten-nu sollittu irukken ippo.
Executive: Okay, okay, leads, leads thingala ma, illa vera edhavathu doubts irukkingala?
Customer: Sir, athan sir leads engalukku varala. Adhavadhu ippo naan ippo free dryer naan search panni ippo Monday oru lead edukaren-nu vachukkongala, andha week full-ah-ve enakku free dryer-ah thaan varudhu.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Idhu vandhu.
Executive: Sollunga. Naan andha last time oru app sollirundhen-la ma, adhu try panni paathingala, andha trade dot?
Customer: Ah, aama sir, try panni paathen sir.
Executive: Adhuleyum adhe maari thaan irukkingala ma, illa?
Customer: Illa illa, adhu okay-va thaan sir irukku, aanaalume engalukku ippo vandhu near by-la vandhu leads onnum illa sir, athan sir pesaren.
Executive: Illa andha trade dot irukku-la, adhuleyume illingala-nu kekkaren.
Customer: Illa sir.
Executive: Okay, andha trade dot-layume illa appidina, so right-ingala vandhu irundhuchu andha categories-ku paathingala innoru by-leads available irundhurukkaadhu. Adhanala thaan ungalukku show aagala. India Mart-layum and then market-la post aana thaan adhu by-leads ungalukku show aagum. Ungalukku leads-la edhume post aagala appidina market-la customer edhume post pannala, post aana thaan namakku show aagum. So, athukku thaan vandhuttu officially ungalukku.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Maam kekkuthungala ungalukku?
Customer: Ah, kekkuthu sir, sollunga sir.
Executive: Adhan maam, so ungalukku adhan officially ungalukku share pannarathukku reason-eh adhu thaan. So, market-la customer post pannaa thaan nammala vandhu by-leads share panna mudiyum. So, andha date-la edho illa appidina adhu empty thaan-eh. So, adhanala thaan adhumey naan ungalukku share panni irundhen. Ungalukku adhumey oru oru one day andha maari range-la thaan vandhuttu by-leads-eh illaama irukkum. Ungalukku continuously adhe maari irukkaadhula, continuously irundhuchingala illa?
Customer: Ippo idhu illa sir, athan solren-la vandha leads-eh thaan vandhuttu irukku thirumba.
Executive: Same oru category-la varudhu-nu solreengala?
Customer: Ah, aama. Appidi illatta konjam budget adhikkama paarthaalumey andha idhu varala, leads-eh varala.
Executive: Andha trade dot-layum search panni paathingala, adhuleyume adhe same feature adhe thaan varudhingala?
Customer: Ah, aama sir. Ippo vandhu nammakitta irukka products vandhaalume adhu vandhu other country andha maari thaan varudhu. Appidi illatta vera district inga Himachal Pradesh, sorry state, Jammu Kashmir andha maari varudhu sir.
Executive: Innum andha past leads-la naan interested mark pannureengala sir, adhu ellamey mark pannureengala?
Customer: Sorry ungaloda voice enakku kekkala.
Executive: Innum andha past leads-la vandhuttu I am interested mark pannuvangala maam, andha sold out aana by-leads ellamey irukkum-la?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Adhu ellamey mark pannureengala adhu?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Adhu neenga okay maam, so adhu neenga konjam regular-ah-ve mark pannunga. So, adhe maari lead manager-layume andha customers-ku last time reply kodukka sollirundhen-la, adhumey mark pannureengala, adhu andha thumb symbol-la important mark pannuradhu?
Customer: Ah, aama aama.
Executive: Idhu ellamey pannittu thaan irukkeenga?
Customer: Aama sir.
Executive: One second maam.
Executive: Okay maam, so neenga idhu mattum regular-ah neenga mark pannunga. So, naan again naan total-ah ella keywords-layum naan tag panni naan back end-layum naan share panren promotion-ku. So, adhu illaama edhavadhu leads irundhuchu appidinaalume naan ungalukku eduthu WhatsApp-layum kooda naan ungalukku share panren vera edhavadhu categories-la. Ippo neenga andha free dryer thaan adhikkama varudhu-nu irukkeengala, so adhu illaama vera edhavadhu categories-la? 
Customer: Free dryer-eh konjam irukkum-nu ninaichen-na varudhu. Enakku vandhu pin and disk, spectro photometer, TOC analyzer andha maari enakku irundhaa okay-va irukkum-nu thonudhu.
Executive: Adhu ellamey search panni paathingala vandhuchingala maam, adhumey?
Customer: Adhu onnum suththama-eh varala.
Executive: Search panniyume varala correct-ungala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Sari okay maam. Okay maam, andha maari leads edhavadhu release aanaalume naan ungalukku WhatsApp-layume naan ungalukku naan share panren maam. Neenga adha kooda eduthu neenga consume pannunga. Neenga adha filter option apply panni neenga eppayum pola neenga use pannunga. Ippo neenga andha free dryer search panni edukareengala, adhe maari neenga vandhuttu ungalukku enna enna manager keywords-o adhu ellamey neenga pottu search pannunga. Neenga adhu-la search panna search panna naan ungalukku andha keywords ellamey naan ungalukku back end-layum naan tag panni kodukkaren. Neenga search pannuveengala, andha history irukkum-la, so andha history base panni andha keywords thaan naan ungalukku tag panni kodukkaren.
Customer: Sari okay sir, sari samaali pannikkalaam maam sir. 
Executive: Kandippa maam. Adhe maari naan sonna steps ellamey neenga konjam follow pannunga. So, ennodai side-la irundhu naan update pannum appidinaalume so unga side-la neenga adhu work pannininga appinna thaan adhu 100% paathingala short out aagum.
Customer: Okay. So, adhanala neenga andha past leads-la ellamey neenga I am interested mark pannunga. Adhu compulsory adhu mark pannunga. Neenga ovvoru feedback-layum neenga systematic-ah irundhaa kodukka-na so ungaludaiya preferred enna-nu appidinnu maari preferred-layum mark panna mudiyum. Innum back end-la vandhuttu indha keywords ellamey naan adhu-la add pannirukken appidinnradhoda neenga edhu input-ah neenga edukareengalo adha vachi naan work pannaa thaan konjam correct-ah irukkum.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Adhanala past leads-la I am interested adhu mark pannunga. Lead manager-la ella customers-kum reply koduthuttu andha by-leads post aagudhu paathingala adhu-la andha thumb symbol koduthu importance-nu mark pannuvom-la lead manager-la?
Customer: Aama sir.
Executive: Indha moonu steps mattum daily basis-la neenga edukkum bodhu neenga idhu pannunga. By-leads edukkum bodhu past leads onnu check pannikkonga. So, customer-a contact pannum bodhu lead manager-la message pannittu oru thumb symbol mattum koduthu important mark pannirunga.
Customer: Okay sir, ippo vandhu furnace edhukku-eh illa sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm, illa naan kandippa naan check panren maam. Ippo naan once andha keywords ellamey naan tag panni naan back end-layume naan share panren. Edhavadhu by-leads irundhuchu appidinaalume naan ungalukku WhatsApp-layume naan ungalukku share panren. Adha kooda neenga consume pannunga.
Customer: Sari okay.
Executive: Major keywords naan enna solreenga maam, free dryer idhu ellamey neenga already ungalukku vandhuttu irukku. Adhu illaama vera enna expect pannreenga enna keywords?
Customer: TOC analyzer, pin and disk, spectro photometer, muffle furnace, high temperature furnace, chamber andha maari gas chromatography.
Executive: Idhu endha location-la prefer pannreenga maam?
Customer: Bangalore, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh.
Executive: Okay maam, Telangana idhunaalume okay thaan maam?
Customer: Ah, okay thaan sir.
Executive: Mostly naan north mattum panna maatten correct-ungala, andha Bihar indha maari north side-la naan panna maatten north.
Customer: Ah, aama, aenaa angellaam vandhu enna solraanganna naan local-laye paathukkaren. Ippo namma vandhu low-va price koduththaalume avanga enna solraanganna transport adhikkama maam, ippo service-um neenga vandhu pannikkida maatteenga. So, naan local-laye paakkaren appidinnu sollittu avanga solraanga north side namma konjam ponaale.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Customer: Adhanala thaan north side vandhu ippo paakkaama south side-eh full-ah paakkuradhu. South side-na Kerala, Kerala side-la-laam vandhu mostly indha idhu solraanga. Naanga service-laam ketta neeyum ungaala panni thara mudiyadhu-nu. Illa naanga pannuvom appidinnu solli sonnaalume avanga vandhu thirumba idhe reason vachittu reject pannirraanga. Price kammiya koduththaalume.
Executive: Okay, ippo namma rendu mey thaan panna porom, product and installation rendu mey thaan panni kodukkara porom.
Customer: Aama ellamey namma pannrom. Free-ya panni tharen-nu sonnaalume avanga.
Customer: Illa sella idhu free thaan andha sella owner and products mattum kaasu varum. First time pannum bodhu ellamey free thaan sir, installation ellamey free thaan.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Executive: Again andha warranty andha maari again poi namma work pannum bodhu mattum payment correct-ungala? Edhavadhu issue-nu sollittu.
Customer: One year two years warranty-na two years-ku apparam vandhu poi pannum bodhu kaasu varum. Avanga enna solraanganna naan sonna time-kulla panna mudiyadhu service appidinnu solli solraanga. Andha andha reason-naala kooda pogum.
Executive: Okay maam okay. Okay maam, indha locations ellamey naan mark panni ungalukku naan share panren leads. Sandhegam edhaavathu maam namma oru similar call panni iruppom-la 96 adhu profile-la seen oru concern-nu irundhaa raise aayirukku.
Customer: Ah, unga sollirundhaanga naan avanga number naan search eduthitten sir.
Executive: Okay maam, so andha position close pannikkalaam-la, vera edhaavathu issue illa illala?
Customer: Ah, illa sir.
Executive: Okay maam, just oru feedback mattum varum. Last time vandha maari thaan oru feedback varum mail-ku. Last time-eh maam-ku thaan poiyirundhuchu-nu ninaichen, maam vera no koduthuttaanga pona vaatti. So, adhu vandhuttu India Mart pathina oru feedback illa. As a account manager naan eppidi ungalukku communicate panren, response panren appidinnradhukku oru feedback thaan adhu. So, adhu last time vandhuttu India Mart mela vandhirukka maari vandhuttu no-nu solli koduthuttaanga. So, adhu again vandhuttu mela oru complaint raise aayirundhuchu.
Customer: Oh, okay sir.
Executive: Okay, so adhukku thaan vandhuttu direct-ah enakke neenga call pannirunga, en customer-ku call panna vaenaam appidinnu maari inform pannirundhen. Okay maam, naan andha concern naan close panren. Again oru mail mattum maam-ku share aagum. So, adhu mattum konjam maam-ku inform pannreengala? Enna mail-ah? Mail-la review varadhu maam, just oru feedback maari thaan irukkum. Oru concern namma raise pannala indha maari issue irukku-nu solli raise pannuradhunala so adhu namma namma side-la irundhu close pannum bodhu oru feedback pogum indha maari. So, account manager issue short out pannangala enna maari communicate pannirukkaanga okay-va appidinnradhu maari oru oru feedback mail-ku receive aagum. Adhu vandhu last time maam-ku thaan receive aanuchu. So, indha time-layume namma close pannum bodhu avangalukku thaan receive aagum. Adhu avanga pona vaatti vandhuttu India Mart response-nu irundhadhula avanga vandhu no koduthuttaanga. But sollapadi paathinganna adhu ennodaiya idhu. So, naan eppidi response panren appidinnradhunaala oru feedback thaan adhu. But engalukku thaan enakku cure aagala idhu naan monthly monthly solra issue thaan-eh.
Executive: Okay thaan maam, idhu vandhuttu as a complaint-ah en maari thaan raise aaganum. Naan ungalukku service issue-la naan ungalukku support panren. Naan ungalukku leads ellamey naan share panren. So, idhu irukkum.
Customer: Okay. Idhu neenga India Mart-ku raise pannininga-na parava illa-la, idhu ennodaiya mela raise aagura complaint illa adhu. Naan ungalukitta call pick pannala, naan ungalukku service proper-ah kodukkala appidinnradhu maariyaana concern idhu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: India Mart mela ippo enakku leads varala appidinnradhu maari irundhuchinna problem illa adhu-ku solren. Naan ungalukku adhu thaan maam service reason-na ungalukku idhu ellamey neenga mark pannunga. Ennodaiya side-la irundhu naan kandippa naan back end-la once naan update pannittu ungalukku naan leads-la irundhuchinna naan ungalukku WhatsApp-layum poi share panren. Neenga andha trade.indiamart-la irukku paathingala adhuleyume konjam active-ah-ve irunga. Okay, support pannikkalaam. Trade.indiamart-la vandhu enna oru issue-na naanga vandhu ippo oru sella product vandhu search pannrom-na adhu varudhu but contact by now kodukka mudiyala adhu vandhu andha leads vandhu poiyiruchu sir, aayittangala?
Executive: Adhan maybe eduthirundhaa andha nerathula ungalukke show aagum-la, timing show aagum-la yesterday by-leads-ka andha maari show aagum-la timing.
Customer: Illa appidi ellaam onnum show aagala. Just now-nu thaan kaanikkum oru rendu nimisham andha maari thaan kaanikkum. Naan search panni ponaa inga contact by now vandhu kaanikkaadhu, kaattaadhu.
Executive: Okay, neenga appidina neenga mela irundhu andha by-leads click pannininga-na ulla andha data show aagum-la, adhu mela link irukkum-la andha link mattum neenga copy pannittu neenga normal edho oru WhatsApp andha maari kooda neenga adhu-la paste pannikkonga. Adhula irundhu click pannininga-na direct-ah namma idhuleye vandhurum. By-leads page irukku paathingala adhuleye ungalukku vandhurum. Adhula irundhu neenga appidiye contact pannikkonga.
Customer: Okay. Maybe idhu namma vera tab-la potta-naala ungalukku appidi show aagum. Neenga mela andha link mattum copy pannikkonga andha by-leads-oda link-ku mattum mela copy pannikkonga. Adhu neenga normal-ah WhatsApp-la idhula kooda neenga share pannittu adhula irundhu neenga click pannininga appidina direct-ah namma by-leads page-kku vandhurum. By-leads namma contact pannrom-la andha page-kku reflect aayirum.
Customer: Okay, okay sir. Adhula irundhu kooda neenga click panni adha contact pannikkonga. Adhu konjam easy-ah irukkum.
Customer: Okay sir, naan panniyathu try pannikaren.
Executive: Okay maam, okay maam, naan andha concern close panren. Konjam maam-ta mattum inform panni andha feedback mattum konjam kodukka sollunga. Again neenga no koduthura poraanga.
Customer: Okay sir, solren sir.
Executive: Sari okay maam, naan close pannirren. Oru 10 to 15 minutes-la oru mail mattum varum adhu mattum konjam pesi inform pannirunga maam, sari-ungala?
Customer: Sari sir.
Executive: Sari okay maam, vera edhaavathu irundhaa enakku call pannunga illa WhatsApp-la kooda text pannunga maam. Maybe naan call edukala appidina vandhu vera edhaavathu client-ta pesittu irundhaalumey enakku oru WhatsApp-la mattum text pannunga naan again ungalukku koopidren, sari-ungala?
Customer: Sari okay sir.
Executive: Sari okay maam, thank you maam, thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not relevant to the business.

- Leads from other countries are being received.

- Leads are not showing contact details.



Resolution:

- Executive shared tips to get relevant leads.

- Executive will tag keywords in the backend.

- Executive will share leads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try the suggested steps.

- Customer will provide feedback on the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, keywords, trade.indiamart, feedback, location
